resources.string:
Hi! My name is Peculiar C.


 I am an Android Developer (Kotlin and Java) 
 and passionate about anything Tech.


 I am a Speaker.(featured at Global Women 
 Conference organised by WomenTech 
 Network with a Topic: Kotlin Programming 
 Language: A Big Fix for Many Java Issues, 
 Women of GADS (Google Africa Developer 
 Scholarship) online sesseion.)


 Am also a Lead. (At She Code Africa, 
 Port Harcourt Chapter, River State, Nigeria. 
 Leading a good number of female to achieve 
 their carrier goal in Tech.


 A mentor at Google Africa Developer 
 Scholarship 2020. Assisting learners to go 
 through the programme without hinches.

 Former Intern at She Code Africa and Hotel NG.


 My journey in tech so far has been learning 
 and learning. This year is about giving out what 
 I have learned. ; 

 I like coaching and mentoring, that is giving 
 back to the community. 
 Looking forward to work at Google and Andela.
